intro: Every mission could be your last — are you ready?
description:
Gray War Conflict is a gritty first-person shooter set deep within a hostile conflict zone — a remote war-torn forest where every step could be your last. As an elite special forces operative, your mission is clear: infiltrate enemy territory, eliminate threats, and survive.

Explore a vast mountain-forest region, scavenge for gear and supplies, and fight your way through enemy patrols using a wide range of modern weapons. From close-quarters combat to tactical long-range takedowns, every encounter is intense and unforgiving.

Key Features:
• Fast-paced FPS combat in a harsh open environment
• A single-player mode focused on clearing zones of enemies
• Weapons include rifles, pistols, SMGs, shotguns, sniper rifles, LMGs, and grenades
• Earn money by eliminating enemies and looting their gear
• Buy new weapons and equipment to improve your chances of survival

No backup. No second chances. Just you, your weapon, and the will to survive. Gray War Conflict delivers raw action in the heart of enemy territory.
